attributes.action: Allow coloured socks in to school
attributes.background: Too many children are being sent home for wearing the wrong colour school socks, education is more important than wearing the right colour socks

rejection.details:
Decisions about school uniform, and teachers' dress codes, are for a school's governing body and management to take.

You could ask your school's governing body to take the action you want to see in your school.

The Department for Education does produce guidance for schools:

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/269113/school_uniform_guidance_2013.pdf

You may wish to submit a petition asking the UK Government to make schools relax their policies on uniform on the specific issue of socks.
